name: CodeSyntax
short_description: CodeSyntax is a Javascript Syntax Highlighting Engine, and Editor. Works perfectly within nearly any browser, or on any web site. It highlights most any programing language ever made. It does this WHILE YOU TYPE.
summary: Code Syntax Highlighting Engine, and Editor for web browsers, and site
